entry.title: Friday night: Snow. Low minus 12.
entry.summary: Snow ending overnight then cloudy. Local blowing snow. Amount 5 cm. Wind northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 increasing to 40 gusting to 60 early this evening. Low minus 12. Wind chill minus 13 this evening and minus 22 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Friday 13 January 2023
